Method Detail

pack

public java.lang.String pack(java.lang.String script,
                             boolean minifyOnly,
                             boolean shrinkVariables)
Packs the script

Parameters:
script - The script to pack
minifyOnly - True if script should only be minified and not encoded and/or its variables shrunk, false otherwise.
shrinkVariables - True if variables should be shrunk, false otherwise. If minifyOnly is true, this option has no side effect.
Returns:
The packed script

getEncoding

public JPackerEncoding getEncoding()
Encoding level. Options are: JPackerEncoding.NONE, JPackerEncoding.NUMERIC, JPackerEncoding.MID, JPackerEncoding.NORMAL and JPackerEncoding.HIGH_ASCII.

Returns:
The current encoding level

setEncoding

public final void setEncoding(JPackerEncoding encoding)
Set the encoding level to use.

Parameters:
encoding -
